properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1 v9 c1 v10 c1 v11

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mighty father I believe -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
You created heaven
and earth -
oh yes Lord I believe.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Yes, yes, I believe,
yes, yes, I believe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I believe in Jesus Christ -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
Everlasting son of God -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Equal in the fathers power -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
And through him all things
were made -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He it was who saved us all -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
And from heaven came
down to earth -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Of the virgin Mary born -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
By the spirit word made flesh -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Suffered death was crucified -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
And he rose up from the dead -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
He ascended into heaven -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
And his kingdom has no end -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
In the spirit I believe -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
Lord and giver of all -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
With the father and the son -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
He is adored and glorified -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
I believe in the holy church -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
And one baptism I profess -
oh yes Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
I shall see him there in heaven -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
Living in the world to come -
oh yes Lord, I believe.
